selftext:
So a scammer tried to scam meâ€¦ asked me my Aadhar and picture for getting gate pass to his flat visit (I am looking for rental flat)â€¦ so I felt fishy. Inserted url in the image and sent him two pics. Man clicked those pic and I got his ip.

Soon he got the images he asked me 2000, which I refused and After me abusing him for being scammer, he tried to blackmail me- and thenðŸ˜Ž
comments: How did u get his ip???
Sent a picture - which has embedded hidden links in itâ€¦ so if he clicks it- and views it, there will be small redirection to google or so, but we will get his ip!
